I wanted so so badly to love these. I had my eye on them for a few weeks, saw an instagran influencer post an outfit with them ad info on a promo so I decided to order. The fabric is lovely and soft with a nice drap, but does wrinkle easily, It is not thick like the photo seems to iply (at least for the brown color). Sadly, these just look frumpy. I am 5'6 123lbs and a size 0/2 (26w jeans). I ordered a small. The waist is so high that it goes up to my rib cage and they hit me at an awkward spot on my leg - not short enough to look intentionally cropped but not long enough to be the proper length. To get the length look for the model you'd have to be 5'3 or less. There is also an excessive amount of fabric in the front from the waistband to the crotch, which is what makes it frumpy and unflattering. This goes beyond stylishly oversized and ventures into "is she wearing adult diapers" territory. It's sad because the legs are cute and they really are soft and comfy. They could take a good 4 inches out of the area and it would probably look incredible. The search continues. These are going back.
These pants are so flattering I bought them in 2 colors and want more! I get so many compliments. And they’re so comfy!
These pants are so soft and durable! I am 170 and I got a Large and they fit comfortable.

评论概述: Very comfy, but the fabric is a fuzz magnet!
评论详情: These pants are incredibly comfortable.  I'm currently fitting in a size 16 jean and the XXL size fit me exactly as I would hope.  I'm 5'9" and pants are almost always too short on me, but these are not, despite other reviewers saying the pants are short on them.  Maybe the length is different based on the size?  The tie on the front is just sewn on as decoration and is not actually a drawstring.  I don't find that I would need a drawstring because the waistband fits nice and snugly without being tight or restricting.I'm not a big fan of the pleat down the front of the legs.  It doesn't look all that nice and to me, almost looks like a mistake in the manufacturing.  Also the fabric really seems to attract the fuzz and pet fur, no matter how many times I use a lint roller.
these are some of the comfiest clothes i have ever put on my body. get them. do not hesitate. i love these
The fabric felt amazing but sadly I had to return because they were too short.  Please offer an option for longer inseams!

These sweats are super cute, and very comfortable! The fit is as expected, but the legs are a little long. I am only 5’1 so that’s not saying much. These may be a good option for taller girls. The pockets are nice and deep, so you can actually put your phone or whatever in there. They are pretty thin, and stretchy, but not at all see-through. They are really great quality. The strings do not adjust the waist, they are just for appearance. I would go ahead and order your normal size, but you could size down if you want a little more of a snug fit. I would really recommend these and I would purchase them again. I love them!

评论概述: These are so soft and smooth

I honestly hate wearing pants, but I want to wear these all the time because they're so soft.
These pants were so perfect.... they were so soft....fit very nice .....color was perfect.... they were just perfect! 😀
From the pictures the pants look long.  Unfortunately they were too short on me.  The material felt weird.

I love these pants!! The waist band is very thick, but the pants are so soft and light weight. I love the material! "grey brown" is a really nice taupe type color. It is very similar to the product photos

These pants are extremely comfortable, and I absolutely love the seam that holds a pleat in the front of the skirt. The material has a nice thickness to it that felt nice and warm during our cold spring evenings.

I am in LOVE with these sweatpants. I absolutely love the loose cut; it is cut and styled in a very flattering way to my backside. Not only do these pants look great on me, but the color and quality of the fabric are excellent. Not only is the fabric soft and comfortable, but the color is also fantastic. I got the deep green color, which I absolutely love. The color is rich, and it pairs well with a cute tank top for a casual fit.

These are very thick & comfy pants! Fits pretty true to size, I normally wear a Medium/ 8-10 in US sizes and was not disappointed by the fit.  They are quite stretchy as well & have very roomy pockets!  The only thing is they are that stretchy shiny polyester blend, so its not something i personally would wear to work or out & about, but would definitely love to wear around the house on a lazy day.  They also don't seem to flare out as much as the picture indicated, its more of a straight/bootcut maybe.  Lastly, the drawstring is just for show so it's kind of a useless feature in my opinion.  5 out of 5 for comfort, 3 out of 5 for wearability, 10 out of 5 for functional pockets!
These are very beautiful pants. They are so soft and comfortable to be able to lounge and run errands in. They fit me really well and they are so pretty.

评论概述: Need more of these comfy pants in my life
评论详情: I love these pants, they are so comfy. I'm not ashamed to say I spent most of the weekend living in them. I can bum around the house in them and they can also be worn out. I did both. I got the medium. For reference, 5' 8", 148 lbs, 30" waist, 40" hips. They fit perfect. Perfect length! The shirred waist sits well at my waist and the pants drape well. The material has enough cotton to make these not that cheap sporty material and does not easily wrinkle. The wide leg and length with the seam running down the front is on trend to go with your chunky sole shoes. Nice to wear during the spring and summer months. Yes! Get these pants, don't miss out.

These pants are long on me but they make my waist look super skinny.  They have a wider than average waist band which sits a bit higher than a standard waist.  It is very flattering.  If only I could grow about 3 inches in height!

Don’t pass these pants by. They are really cute and can be dressed up to wear to work or dressed down to run errands or hang out with friends. The material is of great quality and the craftsmanship of the pants excellent. Also these pants are made for tall women. I’m 5’2” and they are very long but I love them so much I had them shortened. I have received a lot of compliments and have given out the link for others to purchase.

I like the pants, for the quality and the comfort. However when it came to fitting  they are really big. I ordered a size 2xl per the size chart. I probably could have got away with ordering a Large. I wanted them to bit more form fitting.

I really like these sweatpants! The wide leg design is very stylish. Lots of rooms around hips and legs. Also the solid colors are versatile for matching with different tops. They're also very comfortable and perfect for lounging or casual wear. However, I do have to mention that the material is quite thin. Overall, a great pair of pants for comfort and style, but just be aware of the thin material!

I love the color and style of these in these in the advertisement . Once i received them they aren’t actually what I thought at all ! They aren’t sweatpants material at all ! They are the advertised color and shape and style with a tye waist and wide leg pant. They are definitely flowy . They are high waisted and will look cute with a tank top , crop top or body suit for me I know other may go for the t- shirt baggy look that’s in style as well . Even though the fabric isn’t sweatpants the material is soft and comfortable just doesn’t give that look I was hoping for but still gives another type of comfortable look ! These are great for lounging or errands .

Pretty comfortable and soft. Not breathable.in hu.id weather though.  Sizing runs a little large and the waist tie is fake. Would be better if it was an actual tie, so even if your weight fluctuates you'd be able to tie it. Buuut nope. It's a fake tie. :(

I like this product. The stitching is well done all over the pants. The fit is true to size and the material feels comfortable on the skin. This also looks good on a plus sized figure. The pants hold up well in the washing machine and dryer for multiple cycles without losing color or wear on the fabric. I can absolutely recommend this product.

These pants are made of a nice soft material.  The legs are huge and baggy and they come with a thick stretchy elastic band.  I would not call them sweatpants though, because they are not made with a thick sweatpants material.  They are made with the thinner stretchy yoga pants material.  They are extremely comfortable and great for lounging around in.

ITEM: BTFBM Womens Wide Leg Sweatpants (L - Gray Brown)  PROS:  - The color and sizing is accurate. (At 5’ 2” and 165 the L is comfortable).  - The wide top band is really comfortable and gives good, but holding, stretch.  - The material is really soft and comfortable on the skin, but see the cons.  - I haven’t found any stitching or construction errors (but see cons).  NEUTRALS:  - I feel like a grandma.  - The drawstrings are purely decorative.  - You’ll want to be at least 5’ 5” for these or know how to hem. These are long bois.  CONS:  - The material is soft and silky - they’re nothing like actual sweatpants, more like track pants.  - The pleats in the front are not a fold/pleat, but a straight sewn-in line; it’s photoshopped in the images so this isn’t clear. I honestly thought I had them inside out for a second.  - Seriously, I feel like a grandma.  WOULD I PURCHASE?: Absolutely not. I wanted sweatpants, which these are not. I’m pissed and I didn’t even have to pay out of pocket for them. At $30.99 they’d be okay in terms of pricing if they were what I wanted/expected.  CONCLUSION: These are a silky/smooth material and not at all sweatpants. The line on the front is a ridge that’s sewn all the way down. They’re long, so you’ll have to hem or be at least 5’ 5”.  DISCLAIMER: I write completely honest reviews from actual use of the products, with pertinent information that I desire from reviews, in the same way that I would by purchasing them directly (including considering satisfaction from a cost standpoint). I do not condone falsifying reviews by reviewing without using/testing or minimizing/ignoring neutrals or cons about the product. My reviews are updated without removing the original review if new information is discovered or if durability/use impacts the product down the road.  My rating system is: 5 = no/minimal complaints, very pleased 4 = minor complaints, overall satisfied, but could be better 3 = notable complaints, overall average to ‘meh’ 2 = significant complaints, unhappy and will not keep/use 1 = entirely complaints, misleading descriptions, straight to the trash product.
This pants fit my daughter beautifully the material is so soft and cooling they look and are just as described she says they are the most comfortable pants she has
